channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Named a Leader in Frost Radar™ for CNAPP for the Second Year in a Row!
item.description:
In the ever-evolving landscape of cloud security, Microsoft continues to assert its dominance with its comprehensive and innovative solutions. The Frost Radar™: Cloud-Native Application Protection Platforms, 2024 report underscores Microsoft's leadership in both - the innovation and growth index, highlighting several key strengths that set it apart from the competition.
Frost and Sullivan states in its report, “With significant investments in cloud security, a strong partner network, and strategic positioning as a multicloud security provider, Microsoft has a solid foundation for sustained...
